backend/main.mo: Actor managing departments, semesters, subjects, resources, and user profiles with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking specific frontend files to build issues, department dropdown correctness, and loading-state requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables defining light/dark OKLCH color system and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/account/MyPrinci: Displays the user's principal ID with copy‑to‑clipboard support when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Protects admin routes by enforcing login, showing loading states, and blocking access for non-admins.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminHelpS: Help card explaining how to upload or link resources with organization tips for admins.
frontend/src/components/admin/Department: Admin UI for listing departments and managing CRUD dialogs for departments, semesters, and subjects.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResourceMa: Admin interface to add, edit, and remove resources with support for URL/file uploads and flattened resource listing.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout wrapper with header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing copyright, admin link, and external attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation, logo, mobile menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/resources/EmptyS: Generic empty-state card with icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/resources/Resour: Filter panel for searching and narrowing resources by department, semester, subject, and type.
Displays a list of resources with type badges, context info, and open-link action.
frontend/src/features/admin/resourceMuta: Defines React Query mutations for adding, editing, and removing resources, each invalidating the departments query on success.
frontend/src/features/admin/structureMut: Provides mutations for managing departments and subjects via the actor, with automatic departments query invalidation.
frontend/src/features/admin/useAdminStat: Fetches and exposes admin status based on the current identity, handling missing or failing admin checks safely.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogSea: Implements resource filtering by keyword, department, semester, subject, and derived resource type.
frontend/src/features/catalog/useCatalog: Loads all departments using React Query and ties query readiness to actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, identity loading, and state tracking for authentication.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theming for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/resourceType.ts: Derives a resource type from its title and optional URL using keyword matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with tabs for resource and structure management behind an admin guard.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Renders a department→semester→subject browser with loading, empty, and subject list states using fetched catalog data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage hero and feature sections with navigation to browse and search pages.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Builds a searchable, filterable resource list by flattening all department data and handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Shows a subject’s resources with breadcrumb navigation and handles loading and not-found cases.
frontend/src/utils/copyToClipboard.ts: Provides a clipboard copy utility with modern API usage and a textarea fallback.
frontend/src/utils/semesterSort.ts: Sorts semester objects numerically based on digits in their names, falling back to string comparison.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, versioning, and existing feature requirements for the PREMJI StudyHub project.
